mapper.select: select 'p' as platform /*플랫폼*/, (select code from tbl_code_define where value = a.reason and type = 'report_reason') as type, a.mem_no as memNo, a.reported_mem_no as reportMenNo, b.mem_id as memId, c.mem_id as reportMemId, ,(CASE a.status WHEN 0 THEN '신고중' ELSE '처리완료' end) AS status DATE_FORMAT(a.last_upd_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastUpdDate, a.etc as etc From tb_member_report a, tb_member_basic b, tb_member_basic c where a.mem_no = b.mem_no and a.mem_no = c.mem_no and mem_no = #{memNo}
